message.content: {"id": "13620", "title": "Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space in the text", "description": "When accessing the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, there is a significant amount of white space in the text, causing the page to appear incorrectly formatted.", "OB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays text with excessive white space.", "EB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should display text without excessive white space.", "SR": "Ensure that the vertical alignment of the text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page is set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13620', 'title': 'Bug 13620The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': "It's verticalAlignmentshould be set to SWT.ALIGNBEGINNING.STEPS1) Load a project from the repository2) Select a source folder3) Open Properties4) Select Java Source Attachment5 [details]) You will get an info label in the middle of the dialog. "}
